sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'
import { Grid, Menu, Segment, Placeholder, Header, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react'

export default class App extends Component {
  state = { activeItem: 'home' }

  handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name })

  render() {
    const { activeItem } = this.state

    return (
      <Grid>
        <Grid.Row columns={2}>
          <Grid.Column width={3}>
          <Placeholder style={{ height: 150, width: 220 }}>
            <Placeholder.Image />
          </Placeholder>
          </Grid.Column>
          <Grid.Column width={13}>
            <Header as='h1' textAlign='center'>Guardian</Header>
          </Grid.Column>
        </Grid.Row>
        <Grid.Row columns={2}>
          <Grid.Column width={3}>
            <Menu fluid vertical tabular>
              <Menu.Item name='home' active={activeItem === 'home'} onClick={this.handleItemClick} />
              <Menu.Item name='calls' active={activeItem === 'calls'} onClick={this.handleItemClick} /> 
              <Menu.Item name='queues' active={activeItem === 'queues'} onClick={this.handleItemClick} />
              <Menu.Item name='rules' active={activeItem === 'rules'} onClick={this.handleItemClick} />       
            </Menu>
          </Grid.Column>
          <Grid.Column stretched width={13}>
            <Segment>
              <Header as='h1'>Application Header</Header>
              <Container></Container>
            </Segment>
          </Grid.Column>
        </Grid.Row>
      </Grid>
    )
  }
}
